mapper.select: SELECT a.board_id , a.board_subject , a.board_content , a.conslt_cust_id , (select cust_nm from ev_cust_mst where cust_id = a.conslt_cust_id) as conslt_cust_nm , (select email_id from ev_cust_mst where cust_id = a.conslt_cust_id) as email_id , (select board_content from ev_board where board_res_id = a.board_id and del_yn = 'N') as board_reply_content , (select date_format(ins_dtm,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') from ev_board where board_res_id = a.board_id and del_yn = 'N') as board_reply_ins_dtm , a.reg_dt , a.board_stat_cd , (select cd_nm from ev_comm_code where cd_id = a.board_stat_cd) as board_stat_nm FROM ev_board a WHERE a.board_clsf_cd = '101002' /* 1:1 문의 */ AND a.del_yn = 'N' and a.board_id = #{board_id}
SELECT a.* , (select max(board_id) from ev_board where board_res_id = a.board_id) as reply_board_id FROM ev_board a WHERE board_id = #{board_id}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.ins_dtm DESC) as rn , a.board_id , a.board_subject , a.conslt_cust_id , concat(nvl((select concat(cd_nm, ' > ') from ev_comm_code ecc where cd_id = b.category1), ''), (select cust_nm from ev_cust_mst where cust_id = a.conslt_cust_id)) as conslt_cust_nm , a.reg_user_id , (select cust_nm from ev_cust_mst where cust_id = a.reg_user_id) as reg_user_nm , a.reg_dt , a.board_stat_cd , (select cd_nm from ev_comm_code where cd_id = a.board_stat_cd) as board_stat_nm FROM ev_board a inner join ev_cust_mst b on a.conslt_cust_id = b.cust_id WHERE a.board_clsf_cd = '101002' /* 1:1 문의 */ AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.board_res_id = 0
and a.board_subject like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and a.board_content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and b.cust_nm like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and (a.board_subject like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or a.board_content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or b.cust_nm like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and a.board_stat_cd = #{board_stat_cd}
LIMIT #{page_row_start}, #{page_row_cnt}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS row_count FROM ev_board a inner join ev_cust_mst b on a.conslt_cust_id = b.cust_id WHERE a.board_clsf_cd = '101002' /* 1:1 문의 */ AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.board_res_id = 0
and a.board_subject like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and a.board_content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and b.cust_nm like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and (a.board_subject like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or a.board_content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or b.cust_nm like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and a.board_stat_cd = #{board_stat_cd}

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY eb.ins_dtm DESC) as rn , board_id , board_clsf_cd , board_content , (select mgnt_nm from ev_mgnt_user where mgnt_id = eb.ins_user) as ins_user , date_format(ins_dtm,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as ins_dtm from ev_board eb where board_clsf_cd = #{board_clsf_cd} LIMIT #{page_row_start}, #{page_row_cnt}

select board_id , board_clsf_cd , board_content , board_content2 from ev_board where board_id = ( select max(board_id) from ev_board eb where board_clsf_cd = #{board_clsf_cd} and use_yn = 'Y' and del_yn = 'N' )
SELECT COUNT(*) AS row_count from ev_board eb where board_clsf_cd = #{board_clsf_cd} and del_yn = 'N'

select board_id, board_res_id, board_clsf_cd, board_clsf_dtl_cd, reg_dt, board_subject, board_content, board_content2, ref_url, evnt_pticpt, evnt_target, evnt_place, evnt_fr_dt, evnt_to_dt, req_fr_dt, req_fr_hhmm, req_to_dt, req_to_hhmm, use_yn, del_yn, board_stat_cd, reg_user_id, conslt_cust_id, conslt_user_id, board_cnt from ev_board eb where board_clsf_cd = #{board_clsf_cd} and del_yn = 'N'
SELECT board_id, board_content, ref_url FROM ev_board WHERE del_yn = 'N' and use_yn = 'Y' and board_clsf_cd = '101001' order by ins_dtm desc
